content.author: vitalikbuterin
content.content:
🔥PEEPanEIP-7706: Separate gas type for calldata🔥
@VitalikButerin joined #PEEPanEIP with @EthCatHerders to share about #EIP7706. If you missed it, here’s your chance to catch up! 
🎥 piped.video/watch?v=c3TV6Ohj…

Thanks to everyone who joined and especially @Gajpower @robocopsgonemad @ncsgy for adding questions for additional clarifications. 

🧵 Let’s break down the key points again! 👇

#Ethereum #gas #Calldata #Rollups #Layer2

summary: Vitalik Buterin participated in a discussion about EIP-7706, which proposes a separate gas type for calldata. This was part of the PEEPanEIP series with EthCatHerders. The session, which can be rewatched on piped.video, included contributions from community members like Gajpower, robocopsgonemad, and ncsgy, who provided additional questions for clarification. The discussion focused on topics related to Ethereum, gas, calldata, rollups,
